basic.description: This course provides information about the process of applying for public art commissions including in-depth information about each component of the application. Students go through the process of designing a public art project and creating a complete proposal.  This course provides insight into the business side of public art and the experiences of creating a proposal that elucidates the beginning steps of creating work for the public sphere.
basic.subject: ART
basic.title: Entering the Public Sphere: How to Apply for Public Art Commissions

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ART 1000, ART 1201C, ART 1203, ART 1300C, ART 1602C, and ART 2204C.
